title: Interface to USAspending.gov API
Interface to USAspending.gov API
text: can install development version usaspending GitHub :

what: Access USAspending API Agency-Related Endpoints — agency
title: Access USAspending API Agency-Related Endpoints — agency
text: Functions retrieve agency-related data USAspending API. functions provide access agency overview information, budget information, award data, award counts.

title: Access USAspending API Agency-Related Endpoints — agency
code: agency_overview(toptier_code, ...)  agency_awards(toptier_code, fiscal_year = NULL, .page_all = FALSE, ...)  agency_awards_count(toptier_code, fiscal_year = NULL, ...)  agency_awards_count_all(fiscal_year = NULL, .page_all = FALSE, ...)  agency_budget_function_count(toptier_code, fiscal_year = NULL, ...)  agency_budget_functions(   toptier_code,   fiscal_year = NULL,   .page_all = FALSE,   ... )  agency_budget_resources(toptier_code, ...)  agency_federal_accounts(   toptier_code,   fiscal_year = NULL,   .page_all = FALSE,   ... )  agency_object_classes(toptier_code, fiscal_year = NULL, .page_all = FALSE, ...)  agency_program_activities(   toptier_code,   fiscal_year = NULL,   .page_all = FALSE,   ... )  agency_sub_agencies(toptier_code, fiscal_year = NULL, .page_all = FALSE, ...)

title: Access USAspending API Agency-Related Endpoints — agency
text: toptier_code character string representing unique identifier top-tier federal agency (e.g., "086" Department Housing Urban Development). ... Additional parameters passed API endpoint (e.g., page, limit, sort, order). See USAspending API documentation details. fiscal_year Optional numeric value specifying fiscal year query. NULL (default), returns data available fiscal years. .page_all Logical indicating whether retrieve pages results (TRUE) just first page (FALSE, default). Use TRUE complete datasets, aware may take longer large result sets.

title: Access USAspending API Agency-Related Endpoints — agency
text: tibble containing requested agency data. structure varies endpoint: agency_overview(): Basic agency information including name, code, current data agency_awards(): Detailed award information including amounts recipients agency_awards_count(): Count awards category fiscal year agency_awards_count_all(): Government-wide award counts agency_federal_accounts(): Federal accounts associated agency agency_object_classes(): Object class spending agency agency_program_activities(): Program activities agency agency_sub_agencies(): Sub-agencies within main agency agency_budget_function_count(): Count budget functions agency_budget_functions(): Detailed budget function data agency_budget_resources(): Overview agency budgetary resources

title: Access USAspending API Agency-Related Endpoints — agency
text: detailed information API endpoints parameters, visit: https://api.usaspending.gov/docs/

title: Access USAspending API Agency-Related Endpoints — agency
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() # Get overview of Department of Housing and Urban Development agency_overview("086")  # Get 2023 fiscal year awards with complete pagination awards <- agency_awards("086",                         fiscal_year = 2023,                         .page_all = TRUE)  # Get award counts for specific fiscal year award_counts <- agency_awards_count("086", fiscal_year = 2023)  # Get all agency award counts with custom limit all_counts <- agency_awards_count_all(fiscal_year = 2023,                                       limit = 100)  # Get federal accounts for an agency fed_accounts <- agency_federal_accounts("086", fiscal_year = 2023)  # Get object classes with pagination obj_classes <- agency_object_classes("086",                                     fiscal_year = 2023,                                     .page_all = TRUE)  # Get program activities programs <- agency_program_activities("086", fiscal_year = 2023)  # Get sub-agencies sub_agencies <- agency_sub_agencies("086") }

what: Transform an API Response into a Tibble — transform_response
title: Transform an API Response into a Tibble — transform_response
text: Converts USAspending API response tibble format, handling paginated non-paginated responses. function preserves pagination metadata messages attributes resulting tibble.

title: Transform an API Response into a Tibble — transform_response
Transform an API Response into a Tibble — transform_response
text: x API response object containing either 'results' field paginated responses direct data fields non-paginated responses flatten Logical. TRUE, attempts flatten nested data structures within response separate columns. complex nested structures, elements may remain nested tibbles flattened without data loss.

title: Transform an API Response into a Tibble — transform_response
text: tibble containing: Data API response organized columns Pagination metadata attribute (present response) API messages attribute (present response)

title: Transform an API Response into a Tibble — transform_response
text: function automatically handles different response structures: Paginated responses 'results' field Non-paginated responses direct data fields Responses nested data structures (flatten = TRUE)

what: Make a call to the USASpending API — usasp
title: Make a call to the USASpending API — usasp
Make a call to the USASpending API — usasp
Make a call to the USASpending API — usasp
text: endpoint API endpoint call ... Name-value pairs giving API parameters .api_url base URL API .api_version API version use .page_all Logical, whether automatically fetch pages .limit Number results per page (max 100) .as_tibble Logical, whether return response tibble .flatten Logical, whether flatten nested structures tibble output

title: Make a call to the USASpending API — usasp
text: Response API, either tibble raw response

title: Make a call to the USASpending API — usasp
code: # Get single page of results as a tibble usasp("/agency/awards/count", fiscal_year = 2023) #> Error in purrr::map_dfr(x[[1]], ~tibble::tibble(!!!.x)): The package "dplyr" is required for `map_dfr()`.  # Get all pages of flattened results usasp("/agency/awards/count", fiscal_year = 2023,        .page_all = TRUE, .flatten = TRUE) #> ℹ Fetching 8 pages... #> Iterating ■■■■■                             14% | ETA:  1m #> Iterating ■■■■■■■■■■                        29% | ETA: 45s #> Iterating ■■■■■■■■■■■■■■                    43% | ETA: 35s #> Iterating ■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■ title: Interface to USAspending.gov API — usaspending-package
text: Provides comprehensive interface access federal spending data USAspending.gov API (v2). package implements endpoints retrieving data agencies, awards, recipients, reference data, consistent return formats error handling.

title: Interface to USAspending.gov API — usaspending-package
